translated: and having been instructed by my mother,
I developed persistence and was intent,
a perfected one who has seen the deathless;
Having conquered the army of Namuci,
I live without pollutants.🔽Whatever pollutants there were
all without exception have been cut off,
there is no longer any doubt.’

analyzed: pariyanta katam dukkha  antimaḥ iyam samussayaḥ
translated: Suffering has been brought to an end,🔽this is my last body;
there is no more renewed existence.”
